column5: Just wanted to drop a thank you  to MercMan  he took it upon  himself to help make me feel welcome and set me up with this great avatar...   People like him is what makes this such a great site.  Thanks for having me  Strik
I have a sneaky feeling the MERCMAN dabbles in graphic arts just like me!
I do sir. I am fluent in PhotoImpact, Paitshop Pro, Bryce, Poser, and Vue d`Esprit.
Wait til you get to know him a little more! lol   Good work Merc!

I deal with people in Illustrator, Photoshop, Indesign, QuarkExpress;  I don't know how to push the buttons well most of them, I get by. But I do know what I want to accomplish! I tell them what to do!  Advertising typography is me!  Merci,  MERCMAN
When in High school for photography class i made a sports illustrated cover with me playing for the Miami Heat. It was pretty convincing too. photoshop is the best

Mercman is the "MAN" and my favorite C.C. by far........GREAT GUY and someday we'll meet for a day of fishing and he'll get a  honorary induction to my REDNECK Brotherhood..."Git R Done" with my buddy Larry the Cable Guy.....  :clapping:
